title: Chicken and mango salad

default: salt and freshly ground black pepper
½tsp lemongrass, inner white finely chopped

steps: Heat the olive oil in a frying pan over a medium to high heat, fry the chicken strips for approximately ten minutes or until the chicken is cooked through, season and drain off juices.
In a large bowl whisk together the sesame oil, soy sauce, lime juice, garlic, lemongrass and onion.
Add the mango, chicken, herbs. Season and toss together.
Serve in a tall pile on a plate with the broccoli.
